answers.edutizm_platform: What is the function of the EduSystem platform?
answers.learning_center_description: Help build a system at your training center. Consolidate data in paper and excel files to increase efficiency
answers.learning_center_analytics: Analyzes the status of your training center
answers.learning_center_analytics_description: Reports are very important for the development of the training center. You keep all reports through EDUTIZIM. You can plan your activities through your students, financial and marketing reports
answers.customers_automates_description: EDUTIZIM calculates leads from all sources and automates working with them
answers.platform_demo: The platform is available in Demo version.
answers.platform_demo_description: You can use the platform's features for free for 14 days through our Demo version

mobile.mobile_application_info: Our mobile apps have made your job easier. Now you can work without too much effort

main.learning_center_info: Helps build a system at your training center. Now you can easily keep track of your customers and employees. You will know all about them.
main.about_staff_salaries: Now you donâ€™t have to calculate the monthly for your employees and assign them a KPI. EDUTIZIM will help you. Get your financial statements through EDUTIZIM
main.android_app_for_customers: There are android apps for your customers and employees. They get all the information through them

panel.reader_complete_info: Gathering more information about your student will help you. There is a risk of using exel and similar files, which can be lost. This is why programs are handy for storing such data
panel.convenience_for_teachers_info: Our teachers can monitor students' level of knowledge, attendance, attendance, and financial status under a contract with the training center over the phone in real time. This will help you save time and work effectively with customers
